appShortName.description: The short_name (maximum of 12 characters recommended) is a short version of the app's name

browserActionTitle.description: The title of the browser action button

deleteAllUserDataButton.description: Text for the button to request all user data be deleted

userIdExplanation.message: Your user ID is also your password. Do not share it. You can copy your user ID to another device or browser to import your account to that device or browser.

invalidUserId.message: The user ID is not valid. It must be a valid UUID v4.

themePreferenceDescription.message: Your choice of dark mode or light mode in your device's settings is used to deteremine if Emojit should have a dark theme or a light theme.

deleteAllUserDataConfirmation.message: Delete all of your data? (this cannot be undone)
deleteAllUserDataConfirmation.description: Confirm if all of the user's data should be deleted

errorCode_URL_TOO_LONG.message: The URL is too long. It might contain private information.

noBadges.message: You don't have any badges yet. Keep rating pages to earn badges.

errorGettingBadges.message: There was an error getting your badges.

errorGettingHistory.message: There was an error getting your history.

noHistory.message: You haven't rated any pages yet.
